title: Socket-Outlets
generalRequirement: Socket-outlets shall not be installed within 0.3 m of the floor of a bathroom, laundry, or other similar location where the floor is likely to become wet.

zoneRequirements.requirement: Socket-outlets shall not be installed in Zone 0 or 1.

zoneRequirements.introduction: Socket-outlets installed in Zone 2 shall be:
requirements: of the automatic switching type incorporated in a shaver supply unit complying with AS/NZS 3194

protected by an RCD with a fixed rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA and enclosed in a cupboard that maintains the enclosure of the socket-outlet during normal operation of the connected equipment

zoneRequirements.introduction: Socket-outlets installed in Zone 3 shall be:
requirements: protected by an RCD with a fixed rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA
supplied individually as a separated circuit, in accordance with Clause 7.4
supplied as an SELV or a PELV system, in accordance with Clause 7.5
